issue.title: [CF 1097] No timer Text
issue.body:
I am using Tell me When version 7.2.4 and i orignally had it working with omnicc

as say revealing strike i would have as buff/debuff, focus target and showing timer text, so it would show me how long is left on my target, and similar to blade fury.

Now ive downloaded elvui and the timer is not showing at all, ive disabled omnicc and tried it, enabled omnicc and tried it, and also tried putting on different settings but nothing is working.


> Posted by CurseForge user afflicteddecay | Imported from CurseForge issue #1097 | Raw

comments.body:
ElvUI has its own timer texts, and it forcibly disables OmniCC. TMW has a special setting on each icon to enable ElvUI's timer texts.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
